channel.title: NOTICE: Please read
channel.description:
This thread has been edited by Tree, for the sake of relevance.
First off, this section is for Runescape Class server discussion only. Any Rs2 related threads will be locked and the author will receive a permanent mute. We do not show leniency when it comes to things like this.
Second of all, all RSC server advertisement must be posted [url=http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,119.0.html]here[/url]. If you choose to post it in the wrong section, we will take action against your account.
It's that simple.

item.title: NOTICE: Please read
item.dc:creator: @firewithin3 firewithin3
item.description:
@firewithin3 wrote:

[quote=“ephemeral, post:9, topic:208976”]newyears2: What the hell does this have to do with anything currently said? I know I am very fucked up right now (drunk), but you don’t have to say this since it have no reason whatsoever![/quote]Lol, I’m about to go get drunk right now. Underage drinking ftw!
Btw: You type pretty good for being “drunk”.

Read full topic

item.title: NOTICE: Please read
item.dc:creator: @xT-e xT-e
item.description:
@xT-e wrote:

Lothy, i was thinking, about you saying you want to restore the rsc section to what it was, having users that know what they are talking about. To do this, make a quiz, like you have done for the entire forum, but base it on rsc knowledge, and java knowledge before people can post on the rsc forums.

edit: also, you could add a time between tries for people that fail the quiz, as to deter rs2, 12 year olds, and spammers, from trying to get in.

Read full topic

item.title: NOTICE: Please read
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

[quote=“t x, post:4, topic:208976”]Why dont ya just ask moparisthebest to make a rsc server status? because there will be alot of spamm in that section with rs2 and rsc servers what only advesting there forums?

~T X[/quote]
That should be happening in the future. This advertisement section is temporary so that development people can go to a forum without advertisement topics, so that people can still advertise (without annoying others), and so that Mopar can update the status page when he has the time to do so.

Read full topic

item.title: NOTICE: Please read
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

There’s no need for a help section. Back in the good ol’ days, people were expected to have the know-how to perform the basics.
I plan to restore the section to such a state; if someone can’t put the time and effort into figuring something out, then that someone can go without.

Read full topic
